title: Rito pls add disable repeated pings option...
body:
Sometimes I lag when two people ping me multiple times even after I say in chat that I get the message (or that it isn't even helping. How the hell am I supposed to benefit from 'enemy missing' while running from a Hecarim or Lux ult?)

Can you pleaseee add an option to remove the sound and graphic part of a ping after the first if the same person uses the same ping multiple times on your screen? Usually one is enough, and if it's really urgent someone else will ping.

replies.body: lmao if you lag from pings, perhaps you should get a new computer.
10 pings on my screen in quick succession is also distracting, the lag is actually the less annoying part.
